rooms.description: A spacious entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light and ventilation, serving as a transitional space from the outdoors.
A centrally located living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample sunlight and open views, aligned with Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow.
A dedicated dining space integrated into the living room or adjacent, with ample natural light.
A quiet and dedicated office space optimized for work efficiency with ample sunlight from floor-to-ceiling windows, positioned according to Vastu guidelines.
A modern kitchen with high-end finishes and integrated storage, located conveniently to serve both the dining area and living spaces.
A functional ground floor bathroom for guest convenience.

openings.description: Main entrance following traditional Kerala-style aesthetics with local materials.
Floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure abundant natural light and maintain traditional Kerala architectural style.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and floor-to-ceiling windows for a luxurious living experience.
Additional bedroom designed with Kerala-style aesthetics and modern amenities.
Another comfortable bedroom maintaining traditional design elements.
Additional bedroom designed with Kerala-style aesthetics and modern amenities.
Another comfortable bedroom maintaining traditional design elements.
A functional bathroom for the upper floor.

openings.description: Balconies with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy and natural light, aligned to Vastu principles.
